data.message: How can you delete the messages on the messenger app?

replies.message: Thanks for the question, OU Jha Konet Rasta. To delete a message, open a conversation stream, press and hold a specific message and options will pop up, including the option to delete. -Ryan
OU Jha Konet Rasta I urge you to read through the permissions required to use the messenger app.  Tee access you are giving facebook is disturbing.
Why did they have to change it anyways IT WORKED FINE BEFORE!!!

Everyone should read the privacy notice. PRIVACY IS WHAT YOUR GIVING UP! Do not like messenger! Having everything in one FB app is ENOUGH! Please please reconsider this! I also do Not like it uses my Data !!

Will not download the messenger app….why change what we have? So many of us are unhappy with that change. We are exchanging numbers and emails to message each other. Also why do videos just start playing? If I want to watch something, I should be able to choose what plays and what doesn't. Close to deleting Facebook altogether.
What FB fails to mention they keep all your information, even after you delete it.
